  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.pos="H", 
  out.extra="",
  dev="ragg_png",
  fig.showtext=TRUE,
  cache=FALSE)

showtext_opts(dpi=200)
showtext_auto()
load("graphs_pbinter_fipu.rda")
